You can play with other players in the party.
Approach the character you want to invite in party and then right-click on it
Spontaneous Recovery is slow compared to other recovery methods, but it does not require the player to do anything.
[Potion Recovery] : Recover HP/SP/Stamina immediately using potions.
Potions have cooldown times before you can re-use.
[Tree Root Crystal] : Destroy Tree Root Crystals to recover stamina.
Tree Root Crystals are randomly generated around the field.
[Rest Mode] : Using the bonfire during rest mode speeds up your recovery.
Recovery in Rest mode is faster than Spontaneous Recovery and it is even faster if you use bonfire during Rest mode.
Overkill is triggered when you defeat a monster with a powerful finishing attack.
Overkill is triggered when your skill damage is greater than the monster's remaining HP.
Restore your stamina by destroying Root Crystals.
You can find Root Crystals scattered around the field.
If you destroy the Tree Root Crystal, the stamina of all the players around will recover.
Certain skills will trigger Overheat if used consecutively.
If Overheat is triggered, you will be unable to use that skill until it cools down.
Overheat is triggered when the gauge below the icon is full.
To avoid Overheat, you must use different skills in combination.
